reviews.sentence: Waterfront hotel. We checked in for a Sunday to We d stay. I tried to check in at 310 but was told they were unable to check us in until the posted time of 330. I upgraded our room from a queen to the oceanfront King and was quoted 200 per night. Later that night the front desk called me to tell me she made a mistake and it should have been 400 a night but she spoke with the owner and they could do 300 instead. I did not have a choice unles I wanted to move our stuff to a different room. The pool was dirty so we did not swim. The staff was pleasant to us and the room was clean. This is a good older cheap place to stay. It worked for us because we were not there except to sleep. location. outdoor seating from our room. notified the staff the patio door would not open. No one came to fix it. We had to walk around the door outside to get to our patio.

Cute fresh local friendly. Great atmosphere. Clean. Friendly. Close to a number of different restaurants. Fanatic view of ocean outside not from romOnly 3 ocean front rooms. WiFi was like dial up speed. Bed was VERY squeaky and felt it would break under my 120 lb body.

Place is a big shanti. Should of stayed in a tent. The dude Todd is a real winner too. Guy threatened to arrest us after taking a couple extra towels after we payed 500 dollars to stay there for the weekend. Would not recommend to ANYBODY.

Forget Harbor Lights Motel Islamorada Keep going. The location was easy to find. Manager owner woman not very pleasant. Had trouble with electrical power. Grounds around the motel not kept up whatsoever. Like no one has ever done any maintenance. Locked ice machine after 10PM. What in the hell is that all about. We could not obtain ice into the evening. It was in the 90s too. Ice would have been nice. We have never never experienced this issue from any other lodge or motel in the keys or anywhere else. Ridiculous. And the biggest issue. the bed was crunchy. When you sat on it it actually creaked and crunched VERY LOUDLY. We have never experienced this issue with a bed. Like the innards were all destroyed and broken. No support either. Terrible. Terrible. And they did not know this. Plus the cost for this motel was way too high for what customers get. We would absolutely never recommend this motel.
DO NOT STAY AT THE HARBOR LIGHTS. DO NOT STAY AT THIS HOTEL. I have traveled extensively and have NEVER been treated so poorly by staff. By the time I left I was crying after being verbally abused.
Like a visit to a retro 60s motel. Location and ground floor close parking access. Age of the building fixtures and standard of maintenance.

GREAT HOTEL FOR THE PRICE. I was VERY happy with my room. The one of 3 ocean view rooms 3rd floor the best if you like to get sun off your balcony. Being a quite single 60 year old male I was pleased there were no young and noisy neighbors. The maid service was superb. This place is as clean as you can get. The only thing wrong with my room was it was cold. There was no door sweep to keep the draft out. and unfortunately it was a cold week. I did throw a towel under the door which helped. There was an air conditioner but not a heater. So it was kind of uncomfortableIn the evening hours. I did not come prepared with cold weather night ware. At bedtime I used the other beds comforter. Which sufficed. I wish there was an extra blanket in the closet. But I know this was an unusually cold week and things like that are not necessary. Although this place is not the most beautiful motel on the island. I guarantee if your not a picky person who needs all the best things a hotel has to offer you will not regret your stay. The price is one of the lowest in the keys. That is what caught my eye. I worried a little about the reviews but gave it a chance. I am happy I did. I want that room I had again but please get a door sweep. cause I will be back. THANKS STAFF.

Terrible service. The hotel was cheap so I can not complain that much but the room looks like it has not been updated since the 80s and the owner and management are crazy. We saw the cops get called the first night we where there because someone used the boat ramp an hour after it closed. Then the last night we were there we were almost kicked off the property for not winding up a garden hose. No joke it was crazy.

Ghetto room priced as Luxury hotel. Never payed so much for such a terrible place. The ceiling was falling the door was peeling and broken the carpet was filthy dirty being at least 40 years old. no curtain no decoration in the room. Simply disgusting ghetto place everTV so outdated that could possibly placed in a museum.

Well located great service but a little overpriced. Loved that our room was cleaned every day even with fresh towels which a lot of places do not do. Very well located. The girl at the front desk was very friendly and the owner manager was very understanding when I accidentally damaged a lamp knocking it over in the dark. I thought it was a little expensive for what it was. We were on the ground floor so our room was a bit dark.
Wonderful location right on the waters edge. Rooms with sea view very large and well equipped. Wifi not the best but that sinks into insignificance the first time you watch the sunrise.

Cute. Just returned from a quick trip with the family and we were very happy with the hotel. The rooms were beautiful. modern beachy and clean enjoyed the games on site with the kids. great location for getting around Islamorada.
NIce palce to visit. Nice place that has been recently renovated. Front desk staff was very knowledgeable on the local area.
Exceptional. Very clean. Front desk receptionist Gisele was excellent. Professional warm and engaging. She went far beyond to make our experience there superb.

This is our new place to stay when we stay for our short weekend in the Keys. We live about 45 minutes away but sometimes we fish and stay in Islamorada. Our previous hotel was under construction from hurricane Irma and I had family coming into town for the first time. I wanted to make our guests comfortable and I took a chance on this hotel since the reviews were subpar but it was AMAZING. This is not a 5 star rating for similarity to the Ritz Carlton but it is a 5 star by exceeding my expectations. We are in our mid30 ’s and I feel that it would be a family friendly place for us and our friends to have a weekend getaway.
Excellent. Modern clean rooms. On water with heated pool and beach games. Breakfast could gave been little better.
Memorial Day Weekend. Our experience was so great. Beautiful resort comfortable room and so many amenities. Melvin was the best. Ca n’t wait to go back.

Relaxing stay. Enjoyed our stay this week at this inn. The rooms were really nice. Pictures as seen on their website. Full sized fridge. Favorite place is by the water. Lined by a lot of beach chairs. We regret that we did n’t get to use the kayaks and padleboards included in the stay because it was such a short stay. The inn is by the road but car noise did n’t really bother us. The other side is the sea. There is a small pool but we did n’t get to use it either. I would stay here again if I was in the area.
Excellent stay if you want peace and solitude. Check in staff was the friendliest person.
Exceptional. The beach area was wonderful beautiful and relaxing. Used a paddle board for the first time complimentary and had a blast.
